TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector

summary.span: 包含可选项列表。

span.span: Contains a list of selectable items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的对象（如字符串、图像或面板）的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information, see the class. 中的多个项是可见的，这与 不同，后者只有选定项可见，除非 属性 `true`。More than one item in a is visible, unlike the , which has only the selected item visible unless the property is `true`. 属性确定 中的多个项是否一次可选择。The property determines whether more than one item in the is selectable at a time. 属性确定用户一次可以选择多少项。The property determines how many items a user can select at one time. 可以将属性设置为 （默认值）、或 。You can set the property to (the default), , or . 下表描述了这些枚举值的行为。The following table described the behavior of these enumeration values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||用户一次只能选择一项。The user can select only one item at a time.| ||用户可以选择多个项而无需按下修改键。The user can select multiple items without holding down a modifier key.| ||通过按住 CTRL 键并单击这些项，用户可以选择多个连续项，同时按住 SHIFT 键或不连续项。The user can select multiple consecutive items while holding down the SHIFT key or non-consecutive items by holding down the CTRL key and clicking the items.| 控件通常与数据绑定一起使用。 controls are often used with data binding. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据绑定概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview)。For more information, see [Data Binding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview). 显示大量项可能会导致性能问题。Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues. 有关详细信息，请参阅[优化性能：控件](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls)。See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls) for more information. ## 自定义 ListBox 控件Customizing the ListBox Control 若要对多个 控件应用相同的属性设置，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认 以使控件具有独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建 的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于 的部分和状态，请参阅[ListBox 样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/listbox-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ListBox Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/listbox-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 并订阅 事件。The following example creates a and subscribes to the event. [!code-xaml[ListBoxEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该对象不可见，则在视区的顶部或底部对齐。If the object is not visible, it is aligned at the top or bottom of the viewport. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法将列表框中的项滚动到视区中。The following example shows how to use the method to scroll an item in the list box into the viewport. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 不等于 时，应使用此属性。This property is meant to be used when does not equal . 如果选择模式为 则 要使用的正确属性。If the selection mode is the correct property to use is . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定列表框是否具有任何选定项。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether a list box has any selected items.
